p.n: Game 1: Warriors Overcome LeBron James' 44 to secure opener
p.k: The Warriors held off LeBron James and the Cavs for 108-100 OT win in Game 1. Stephen Curry had 26 points and eight assists

p.n: Game 1: Warriors Survive LeBron James' 51 points in OT thriller
p.k: Stephen Curry scored 29 points and the Warriors capitalized on JR Smith's mistake that sent the game into overtime, overcoming a 51-point performance

p.n: Game 1: Allen Iverson's 48 points leads Philadelphia in surprising win
p.k: 76ers G. Allen Iverson scored 48 points to stun the Lakers in Game 1 of the 2001 NBA Finals

p.n: Game 1: Tony Parker's clutch game-winner propels Spurs
p.k: The Spurs knocked off the Heat led by Tony Parker with 21 points

p.n: Game 1: Spurs Survive the heat, and Heat, in Finals opener
p.k: Tim Duncan had 21 points and 10 rebounds, and the Spurs beat the Heat 110-95 on Thursday night in Game 1 at steamy AT&T Center
Hakeem Olajuwon led all scorers with 31 points as the Rockets withstood a late surge by Shaquille O'Neal and Anfernee Hardaway, both 26 points
